sentence.Network_en: Moonlike reflection appear on the water around the dagobas creating a magical picture.
sentence.Network_cn: 塔四周的水面上映出明月一样的倒影,构成一幅神奇的画面.

auth_sentence.content: The lesbians I'd seen on TV were wiry, thin strips of muscle, but Heidi was round and soft and had a moonlike face.
auth_sentence.res_content: The lesbians I'd seen on TV were wiry, thin strips of muscle, but Heidi was round and soft and had a moonlike face.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The lesbians I'd seen on TV were wiry, thin strips of muscle, but Heidi was round and soft and had a moonlike face.

auth_sentence.content: His head is pale and moonlike; he is all pate, cheek, and mustache.
auth_sentence.res_content: His head is pale and moonlike; he is all pate, cheek, and mustache.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His head is pale and moonlike; he is all pate, cheek, and mustache.
